ca.ualberta.team10projectw2014.models

Class LocationListenerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.team10projectw2014.models.LocationListenerModel

  • public class LocationListenerModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1 (current version number of program) This class is used to deal with listening for the user's most accurate current location and returning that location upon request.
    Author:
    Bradley Poulette

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocationListenerModel(Context context)
      Checks to see if either network or GPS are enabled, and asks user to turn GPS on if it is disabled.

    • Method Summary
